fields.name: description
fields.description: The field for the description record component.

fields.name: compatibility
fields.description: The field for the compatibility record component.

fields.name: requestedFeatures
fields.description: The field for the requestedFeatures record component.

fields.name: overlays
fields.description: The field for the overlays record component.

fields.name: hidden
fields.description: The field for the hidden record component.

constructors.name: Info
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a Info record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) ; primitive components are compared with '=='.

methods.name: description
methods.description: Returns the value of the description record component.

methods.name: compatibility
methods.description: Returns the value of the compatibility record component.

methods.name: requestedFeatures
methods.description: Returns the value of the requestedFeatures record component.

methods.name: overlays
methods.description: Returns the value of the overlays record component.

methods.name: hidden
methods.description: Returns the value of the hidden record component.
